SELECT a.name, b.role_id as roleId, b.user_id as userId, c.role_name as roleName, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime FROM tb_user a LEFT JOIN tb_user_role b ON a.id= b.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_role c ON c.id= b.role_id where a.deleted=0
and a.name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
